tool_description: With the Holiday API, you can easily access information about all the holidays that are celebrated in Canada, including federal and provincial holidays. Whether you’re a business owner looking to plan your company’s holiday schedule, a teacher planning a lesson on Canadian holidays, or just someone who is interested in learning more about the holidays that are celebrated in Canada, the Holiday API has the information you need.
name: Holidays API
title: Holidays API

api_list.name: /holidays/<province>/<type>
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all holidays in a specific province with a specific type

For Ontario Required Parameters ON
For Quebec Required Parameters QC
For Nova Scotia Required Parameters NS
For New Brunswick Required Parameters NB
For Manitoba Required Parameters MB
For British Columbia Required Parameters BC
For Prince Edward Island Required Parameters PE
For Saskatchewan Required Parameters SK
For Alberta Required Parameters AB
For Newfoundland and Labrador Required Parameters NL
For Nunavut Required Parameters NU
For Yukon Required Parameters YT
For Northwest Territories Required Parameters NT

Type: federal or provincial

api_list.name: /holidays/<province>
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all holidays, grouped by name

For Ontario Required Parameters ON
For Quebec Required Parameters QC
For Nova Scotia Required Parameters NS
For New Brunswick Required Parameters NB
For Manitoba Required Parameters MB
For British Columbia Required Parameters BC
For Prince Edward Island Required Parameters PE
For Saskatchewan Required Parameters SK
For Alberta Required Parameters AB
For Newfoundland and Labrador Required Parameters NL
For Nunavut Required Parameters NU
For Yukon Required Parameters YT
For Northwest Territories Required Parameters NT

api_list.name: /holidays
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all holidays in the holidays.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://holidays-api.p.rapidapi.com/holidays"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "holidays-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://holidays-api.p.rapidapi.com/holidays"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "holidays-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
